# Modelos de ecuaciones estructurales (análisis de senderos multinivel)

## Mediación Multinivel: upper-level mediation (2-1-1)

```{r msem-model-apbi-soci, warning=FALSE}
msem_apbi <- '
level: 1
      # Modelo estructural nivel 1
      apbi ~ b1*repbi + b2*sacci + b3*segui  + b4*desgr + b5*edadi + b6*educi + b7*essui + b8*time

      # Covarianzas
      repbi ~~ segui
      segui ~~ sacci
      sacci ~~ repbi
      desgr ~~ repbi
      desgr ~~ sacci
      desgr ~~ segui
      educi ~~ essui
      edadi ~~ time
      
level: 2
      # Modelo estructural nivel 2
      apbi ~ b1*repbi + b2*sacci + b3*segui  + b4*desgr + c1*ismt_rank + c2*theil_mixt + c3*jane_indx
      repbi ~ a1*ismt_rank
      sacci ~ a2*ismt_rank
      segui ~ a3*theil_mixt
      desgr ~ a4*theil_mixt

      # Covarianzas
      repbi ~~ segui
      segui ~~ sacci
      sacci ~~ repbi
      desgr ~~ repbi
      desgr ~~ sacci
      desgr ~~ segui
      theil_mixt ~~ ismt_rank
      theil_mixt ~~ jane_indx
      jane_indx ~~ ismt_rank
      
      # Efecto indirecto 
      ind_ismt_repbi_apbi := a1*b1
      ind_ismt_sacci_apbi := a2*b2
      ind_mixt_segui_apbi := a3*b3
      ind_mixt_desgr_apbi := a4*b4

      # Efecto total 
      tot_ismt_repbi_apbi := c1 + (a1*b1)
      tot_ismt_sacci_apbi := c1 + (a2*b2)
      tot_mixt_segui_apbi := c1 + (a3*b3)
      tot_mixt_desgr_apbi := c1 + (a4*b4)
'

fit_msem_apbi <- sem(msem_apbi, data = elsoc_apbi, cluster = "cod_zona", verbose = TRUE, optim.method = "em")
summary(fit_msem_apbi, fit.measures = T)

msem_soci <- '
level: 1
      # Modelo estructural nivel 1
      soci ~ b1*repbi + b2*sacci + b3*segui  + b4*desgr + b5*edadi + b6*educi + b7*essui + b8*time

      # Covarianzas
      repbi ~~ segui
      segui ~~ sacci
      sacci ~~ repbi
      desgr ~~ repbi
      desgr ~~ sacci
      desgr ~~ segui
      educi ~~ essui
      edadi ~~ time
      
level: 2
      # Modelo estructural nivel 2
      soci ~ b1*repbi + b2*sacci + b3*segui  + b4*desgr + c1*ismt_rank + c2*theil_mixt + c3*jane_indx
      repbi ~ a1*ismt_rank
      sacci ~ a2*ismt_rank
      segui ~ a3*theil_mixt
      desgr ~ a4*theil_mixt

      # Covarianzas
      repbi ~~ segui
      segui ~~ sacci
      sacci ~~ repbi
      desgr ~~ repbi
      desgr ~~ sacci
      desgr ~~ segui
      theil_mixt ~~ ismt_rank
      theil_mixt ~~ jane_indx
      jane_indx ~~ ismt_rank
      
      # Efecto indirecto 
      ind_ismt_repbi_soci := a1*b1
      ind_ismt_sacci_soci := a2*b2
      ind_mixt_segui_soci := a3*b3
      ind_mixt_desgr_soci := a4*b4

      # Efecto total 
      tot_ismt_repbi_soci := c1 + (a1*b1)
      tot_ismt_sacci_soci := c1 + (a2*b2)
      tot_mixt_segui_soci := c1 + (a3*b3)
      tot_mixt_desgr_soci := c1 + (a4*b4)
'

fit_msem_soci <- sem(msem_soci, data = elsoc_soci, cluster = "cod_zona", verbose = TRUE, optim.method = "em")
#summary(fit_msem_soci, fit.measures = T)
```

```{r coef-plot-2v, warning=FALSE}
# apbi
coef_apbi <-
  broom::tidy(fit_msem_apbi, conf.int = TRUE, conf.level = 0.95) %>%
  filter(!level == 1) %>% 
  filter(op %in% c("~", ":="), !str_detect(term, "^tot_"), !str_detect(label, "^a")) %>% 
  data_frame(var = c(rep("Pertenencia"))) %>% 
  dplyr::select(var, term, estimate, conf.low, conf.high)

# soci
coef_soci <-
  broom::tidy(fit_msem_soci, conf.int = TRUE, conf.level = 0.95) %>%
  filter(!level == 1) %>%    
  filter(op %in% c("~", ":="), !str_detect(term, "^tot_"), !str_detect(label, "^a")) %>% 
  data_frame(var = c(rep("Sociabilidad"))) %>% 
  dplyr::select(var, term, estimate, conf.low, conf.high)

coef_msem <- rbind(coef_apbi, coef_soci)

coef_msem <- coef_msem %>% 
  mutate(term = recode(term, 
                       "apbi ~ repbi" = "Reputación",
                       "soci ~ repbi" = "Reputación",
                       "apbi ~ segui" = "Seguridad",
                       "soci ~ segui" = "Seguridad",
                       "apbi ~ sacci" = "Satisfacción",
                       "soci ~ sacci" = "Satisfacción",
                       "apbi ~ desgr" = "Conflicto",
                       "soci ~ desgr" = "Conflicto",
                       "apbi ~ ismt_rank" = "Nse barrio",
                       "soci ~ ismt_rank" = "Nse barrio",
                       "apbi ~ theil_mixt" = "Mixtura",
                       "soci ~ theil_mixt" = "Mixtura",
                       "apbi ~ jane_indx" = "Vitalidad",
                       "soci ~ jane_indx" = "Vitalidad",
                       "ind_ismt_repbi_apbi := a1*b1" = "Nse barrio~\nReputación",
                       "ind_ismt_sacci_apbi := a2*b2" = "Nse barrio~\nSatisfacción",
                       "ind_mixt_segui_apbi := a3*b3" = "Mixtura~\nSeguridad",
                       "ind_mixt_desgr_apbi := a4*b4" = "Mixtura~\nConflicto",

                       "ind_ismt_repbi_soci := a1*b1" = "Nse barrio~\nReputación",
                       "ind_ismt_sacci_soci := a2*b2" = "Nse barrio~\nSatisfacción",
                       "ind_mixt_segui_soci := a3*b3" = "Mixtura~\nSeguridad",
                       "ind_mixt_desgr_soci := a4*b4" = "Mixtura~\nConflicto"))

coef_plot <- coef_msem %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = factor(term, levels = c('Nse barrio', 'Mixtura', 'Vitalidad',
                                         'Reputación', 'Satisfacción', 'Seguridad', 'Conflicto',
                                         'Nse barrio~\nReputación', 'Nse barrio~\nSatisfacción',
                                         'Mixtura~\nSeguridad', 'Mixtura~\nConflicto')), 
           y = estimate)) +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0, color = 'red') +
  geom_point(position = position_dodge(width = -0.6), size = 3) +
  geom_linerange(aes(ymin = conf.low, ymax = conf.high),
                 position = position_dodge(width = -0.6), 
                 size = .8) +
  coord_flip() +
  facet_wrap(.~ var) +
  theme(axis.text = element_text(size =  12),
        axis.title = element_text(size = 12, face = "bold"),
        strip.text = element_text(size = 12, face = "bold")) +
  labs(title = "",
       x = "",
       y = "Coeficientes estandarizados") +
  scale_x_discrete(limits = rev)

coef_plot 

ggsave(coef_plot,filename = "../3_output/graficos/coef_plot_mixt_cob.png", width = 8, height = 6, dpi = 300)
```
